designSystem.summary: Updated design system foundation with: (1) index.html - added Inter font from Google Fonts with weights 300-700, Material Icons Round, and updated page title; (2) tailwind.config.js - created new config with primary color #4F46E5 full scale, Inter font family, and extended borderRadius to 12px/16px/20px; (3) index.css - updated CSS variables to use slate grays instead of warm stone, changed primary to indigo #4F46E5, set background to #F9FAFB, added Tailwind v4 @theme configuration, added custom scrollbar styles matching design, added Material Icons utility class, removed all dark mode variables (light theme only)
